author: Bricksisko
title: Pros and Cons of the Witch Hut
review:
I will make a pro-con list to summarize my thoughts on "The Witch Hut".

 

Pros

-The slime figures are very unique and cool figures.

-The witch figure is a very nice figure. It is exclusive to the set.

-Nice earthy colors. The colors really blend well and feel very natural.

-Not repetitive.

-Potion brewing stand is a really interesting build.

Cons

-Price is a little steep.

-No Steve figure.

-Not enough trees, but you could always create more.

 

Overall a very very good set.
